description: Cycle class sequence c(2n) (the number of true cycles of length 2n in which a certain node is included) for zeolite EAB = TMA-E (Aiello and Barrer)(1) (Me4N)2Na7[ Al9Si27O7.
references: G. Thimm and W. E. Klee, Zeolite cycle sequences, Zeolites, 19, pp. 422-424, 1997.
links: G. Thimm, Cycle sequences of crystal structures
author: Georg Thimm (mgeorg(AT)ntu.edu.sg)
